Texts.Eng: <A book full of writing you recognize as your own, yet you have no recollection of ever writing. Half of the words look unfamiliar, and it's oddly un-slimey, given the rest of your current surroundings>.

<It describes an unfamiliar life, full of unfamiliar exploits you cannot ever recall participating in. But there is no doubting the inflection and word-choice where the writing makes sense. How could you write something, but not remember it?>
